thread.title: Hunt continues for man wanted for multiple offences
thread.title_full: Hunt continues for man wanted for multiple offences | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Hunt continues for man wanted for multiple offences
text:
Police hunting for wanted man Adrian Craigs have asked anybody who may be harbouring him to give him up to the authorities.
Credit: Cleveland Police Officers are still searching for the 31-year-old, who is wanted in connection with a number of offences including breach of bail, actual bodily harm, false imprisonment, common assault and driving under the influence of alcohol.
They believe Craigs is in the Hartlepool area, and is using a grey 4x4 car.
Anyone who sees him is asked not to approach him, but to call 999.
Last updated Mon 28 Sep 2015 Travel Hartlepool
